wisps.marine_to_nc package¶

Submodules¶

wisps.marine_to_nc.marinereader module¶

class wisps.marine_to_nc.marinereader.marinereader(filename='undefined')¶

Class to read Marine CSV text files.

fill_empty_records(n_records, num_obs=14)¶

Method to append empty records to station_list up to n_records. If only 1 record is in a station, fills records from previous dates.

obs_type = 'marine'¶
parse_file(marine_reader, start_date, end_date)¶

Takes an csv reader argument where each iteratable item contains an array representing the observation of a station at a given hour

read(start_date=None, end_date=None)¶

Reads the file stored in self.filename and stores the results as a station list dictionary.

wisps.marine_to_nc.marinereader.strip_array(arr)¶

Strips whitespace out of an array of strings. Will throw TypeError if not given a string list.
